titles.title: Blue Ridge Parkway and Town of Blowing Rock Land Exchange Act of 2009
To authorize a land exchange to acquire lands for the Blue Ridge Parkway from the Town of Blowing Rock, North Carolina, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.

bill.summary:
2/23/2009--Introduced.
Blue Ridge Parkway and Town of Blowing Rock Land Exchange Act of 2009 - Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to exchange approximately 20 acres of land within the boundary of the Blue Ridge Parkway, identified as Blowing Rock Reservoir, for approximately 192 acres of land owned by the town of Blowing Rock in North Carolina.
